name: GooodJob
tag_list: employee-referral-programs, social-recruiting, sourcing, employer-branding, passive-candidates, corporate-recruiters
overview:
GooodJob’s Employee Referral Platform leverages employees’ social media networks to reach top talent while easily motivating participation.

The challenge facing most organizations today is that only 10%-20% of employees are actively involved in referral programs. GooodJob believes that no company should have to settle and that introducing effective motivation tactics and social media tools spurs total employee involvement and maximizes participation.

We enable companies to engage and motivate employees in a smart way which recognizes and rewards all of their referral efforts, not just the end-results. This promotes company-wide enthusiasm and drives long-term commitment. And our sophisticated social media tools help companies securely tap into employees’ extensive Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter networks without compromising their privacy. This multiplies access to passive candidates, and spreads companies’ employer branding messages to a broader audience.

In short, GooodJob benefits organizations by significantly increasing their ROI, broadening their reach to relevant candidates, helping them maintain a strong social media presence, and introducing innovative developments to employees, candidates and management.

milestones.description:
We're proud to announce that GooodJob has been chosen as a finalist in the first-ever startup competition at the Recruiting Innovation Summit on May 17, 2012 – with a chance to win the grand prize of $10,000!

milestones.description: We're thrilled to announce that GooodJob has won second place in the startup competition at the Recruiting Innovation Summit!

milestones.description: GooodJob has released a free Facebook career tab which enables organizations to reach top talent directly from their Facebook pages.
milestones.source_description: GooodJob Releases Free Facebook Career Tab

milestones.description: GooodJob is a finalist in the iHR 2012 tech startup competition to be held at the HR Tech Europe Conference. On October 25, we’ll be in Amsterdam competing against five other companies for a grand prize of €10,000!
milestones.source_description: GooodJob Nominated for European HR Tech Award

milestones.description: We're happy to announce that GooodJob placed in the top 3 in the iHR 2012 tech startup competition at the HR Tech Europe Conference.
